title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Ann Arbor, MI, USA
description:
Global Day of Code Retreat (GDCR) at The Forge in Ann Arbor Complements of Pillar Technology. 
This is also the November event for Code Craftsman Saturdays. Most important: Please registerÂ here (http://www.eventbrite.com/e/november-2014-code-craftsman-saturdays-aka-crazy-coding-saturdaze-tickets-12649899189). 
Code Craftsman Saturdays is a monthly always free workshop, but GDCR is special and usually our largest event of the year. There will be lots of developers of all levels of experience, and of every conceivable description. That's normal for us. Please come join us for the fun.
